dt: {bc}a line (such as a rope) used for saving or preserving life: such as
{bc}a line along the outer edge of the deck of a boat or ship
{bc}a line used to keep contact with a person (such as a diver or astronaut) in a dangerous or potentially dangerous situation
{bc}something regarded as indispensable for the maintaining or protection of life

shortdef: a line (such as a rope) used for saving or preserving life: such as
a line along the outer edge of the deck of a boat or ship
a line used to keep contact with a person (such as a diver or astronaut) in a dangerous or potentially dangerous situation
